content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg city center quite convenient and comfortable. What price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am looking for a place with the lowest price possible. I would say 300 euros per month would be okay for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 300 euros per month is quite a low price for an apartment in the city center, especially for a newly built one. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand that you want to make a profit. But as a student, I have a limited budget. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 400 euros per month is more in line with what I was expecting. However, considering the location and the quality of the apartment, I think we can still find a more attractive price for both of us. Would you be willing to go a bit higher? Let's say 500 euros per month? This would be a fair price for the quality and convenience of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 500 euros per month is quite high for me. But since the apartment is really attractive and in the city center, I am willing to pay 450 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 450 euros per month is closer to what I had in mind. It's a fair price for both parties. Would you be willing to pay a deposit of one month's rent to secure the apartment? This is a standard practice in the rental market to ensure the tenant's commitment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I can agree to pay a deposit of one month's rent. So, if we subtract the deposit from the monthly rent, the net monthly rent would be 425 euros. I agree to the price of 425 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. It's far below what I was expecting for this apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not fair for the quality and location of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's try again. Since the apartment is in the city center and has a good quality, I am willing to pay 490 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 490 euros per month is more acceptable. However, I still believe that the fair market value for this apartment is closer to 500 euros per month, considering the location and amenities. Would you be willing to pay 495 euros per month? This would be a fair compromise.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 495 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. It's still not enough for the quality and location of the apartment. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not fair for the standards I'm trying to maintain.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's try again. Since the apartment is in the city center and has a good quality, I am willing to pay 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Excellent, 500 euros per month is the price I was looking for. This reflects the value of the apartment and its prime location. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease to secure the apartment at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros per month. And yes, I am willing to sign a one-year lease.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Perfect, Emilia. I'm glad we could reach an agreement. The apartment will be yours at 500 euros per month with a one-year lease. Please be prepared to pay the first month's rent and the deposit when you sign the lease. Let's meet at my office next week to finalize the paperwork. Thank you for choosing my apartment. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
